title: Watch.Dogs.DLC.Pack-P2P
description:
Watch Dogs DLC Pack 



  Release Type ......: Add-on  
   
  Ripped ............: Nothing  
   
  Release Date ......: 2014-05-27  
   
  Published By ......: Ubisoft  
   
  Game Genre ........: Action  
   
  Packed With .......: Winrar 5.10  
   
  Crack Used ........: RELOADED  
 
   
  All it takes is the swipe of a finger. We connect with  
  friends. We buy the latest gadgets and gear. We find out  
  what's happening in the world. But with that same simple  
  swipe, we cast an increasingly expansive shadow. With  
  each connection, we leave a digital trail that tracks our  
  every move and milestone, our every like and dislike. And  
  it's not just people. Today, all major cities are  
  networked. Urban infrastructures are monitored and  
  controlled by complex operating systems.  
   
  In Watch_Dogs, this system is called the Central  
  Operating System (ctOS) - and it controls almost every  
  piece of the city's technology and holds key information  
  on all of the city's residents.  
   
  You play as Aiden Pearce, a brilliant hacker and former  
  thug, whose criminal past led to a violent family  
  tragedy. Now on the hunt for those who hurt your family,  
  you'll be able to monitor and hack all who surround you  
  by manipulating everything connected to the city's  
  network. Access omnipresent security cameras, download  
  personal information to locate a target, control traffic  
  lights and public transportation to stop the enemy ... and  
  more.  
   
  Use the city of Chicago as your ultimate weapon and exact  
  your own style of revenge.  

   
  * See included url for more information on this games key  
  features.  

   
  1) Extract TPTB-WDLC.001 using 7-Zip 9.20 or WinRAR.  
   
  2) Copy contents of  Update  folder to installed game directory  
  overwriting all file (s)  
   
  3) Copy contents of  Crack  folder to installed game directory  
  overwriting all file (s)  
   
  4) Copy contents of  Unlocker  to the following directory  
  C:  ProgramData  Orbit  274  <UserName>  overwriting all file (s)  
  as needed.  
   
  5) Play  
 
   
  More Info: http://watchdogs.ubi.com/watchdogs/en-us/home/  
   
   
  Included DLC:  
   
  Season Pass 
  The Palace Pack  
  Conspiracy! 
  Untouchables Pack  
  Club Justice Pack 
  Exclusive Missions Pack  
  Blume Agent Pack 
  Breakthrough Pack  
  DedSec Shadow Pack 
  Signature Shot Pack  
  Cyberpunk Pack  
   
   
  This DLC Pack also contains additional Uplay Unlocks accessed  
  in game via the Weapons Menu. Outfits / Cloths can be accessed  
  in your Safe House via the Wardrobe.  
   
   
  NOTE: This release contains all current DLC until future  
  DLC files are released. Enjoy!  
   
   
  NOTE2: WARNING YOU WILL LOSE YOUR SAVED GAME IF YOU USE THIS  
  DLC UNLOCKER. ALSO NOT TESTED WITH RELOADED RLS AS A  
  SAVED GAME IS REQUIRED FOR UNLOCKS.
